instructions: Open the Facebook app on your Android device. Tap the hamburger menu ( ) in the upper-right corner of the screen. Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy . Tap Settings . Scroll down and tap Media and Contacts . Tap Autoplay . Tap Never Autoplay Videos . You can also choose On Wi-Fi Connections Only if you only want videos to autoplay when you are connected to a wireless network . Exit the settings.

Open the Facebook app on your iPhone. Tap the hamburger menu ( ) in the bottom-right corner of the screen. Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy . Tap Settings . Scroll down to Media and Contacts and tap Videos and Photos . If you don't see Videos and Photos in your iPhone's Facebook app settings, try updating the app . Tap Autoplay . Tap Never Autoplay Videos . You can also choose On Wi-Fi Connections Only if you only want videos to autoplay when you are connected to a wireless network. Exit the app settings.
